item.content:encoded: Druckenmiller on tariffs: "To me, tariffs are simply a consumption tax that foreigners pay for some of it. Now the risk is retaliation, but as long as we stay in the 10% range, ...I think the risks are overblown relative to the rewards, the rewards on high."
